org.apache.logging.log4j.core.net

Class SocketOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.net.SocketOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Builder<SocketOptions>

    @Plugin(name="SocketOptions",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true)
public class SocketOptions
extends Object
implements Builder<SocketOptions>, Cloneable
    Holds all socket options settable via Socket methods.

      • apply

        public void apply(Socket socket)
           throws SocketException
        Applies the values in this builder to the given socket.
        Parameters:
        socket - The target Socket.
        Throws:
        SocketException - if there is an error in the underlying protocol, such as a TCP error.
